Reference

Seasonal adjustment functions

Functions to perform seasonal adjustment with X-13ARIMA or TRAMO-SEATS

jx13() x13()

Seasonal Adjustment with X-13ARIMA-SEATS

x13_spec()

X-13ARIMA-SEATS model specification, SA/X13

jtramoseats() tramoseats()

Seasonal Adjustment with TRAMO-SEATS

tramoseats_spec()

TRAMO-SEATS model specification, SA/TRAMO-SEATS

user_defined_variables()

Get the names of the user-defined variables

plot(<regarima>) plot(<decomposition_X11>) plot(<decomposition_SEATS>) plot(<final>) plot(<SA>)

Plotting regarima, decomposition or final results of SA

save_spec() load_spec()

Saving and loading a model specification, SA and pre-adjustment in X13 and TRAMO-SEATS

s_estimate() s_transform() s_usrdef() s_preOut() s_preVar() s_td() s_easter() s_out() s_arima() s_arimaCoef() s_fcst() s_span() s_x11() s_seats()

Access model specification, SA and pre-adjustment in X13 and TRAMO-SEATS

RegARIMA functions

Functions to only peform regARIMA estimation

jregarima() jregarima_tramoseats() jregarima_x13() regarima() regarima_tramoseats() regarima_x13()

RegARIMA model, pre-adjustment in X13 and TRAMO-SEATS

regarima_spec_tramoseats()

RegARIMA model specification, pre-adjustment in TRAMO-SEATS

regarima_spec_x13()

RegARIMA model specification, pre-adjustment in X13

Manipulate Java objects

Functions to manipulate the Java objects of a seasonal adjustment or a regARIMA model

get_dictionary() get_indicators() jSA2R()

Functions around 'jSA' objects

Manipulate JDemetra+ workspaces

Functions to import and export models JDemetra+ workspaces

load_workspace()

Load a 'JDemetra+' workpace

new_workspace() new_multiprocessing()

Create a workspace or a multi-processing

save_workspace()

Save a workspace

add_sa_item()

Add a seasonnaly adjust model to a multi-processing

get_jmodel() get_model()

Get the seasonally adjusted model from a workspace

compute()

Compute the multi-processing from a workspace

count()

Count the number of objects inside a workspace or multiprocessing

get_name()

Get the Java name of a multiprocessing or a sa_item

get_object() get_all_objects()

Get objects inside a workspace or multiprocessing

get_ts()

Get the input raw time series

Database

ipi_c_eu

Industrial Production Indices in manufacturing in the European Union
